Dialogue.Page: Huh. I never knew you looked up so much to Gabbro.
I know Hornfels is er, a little grumpy muttering to themself there, but hey, Gabbro's not that bad. They're pretty darn knowledgable and passionate about some stuff!
But er, just a hunch? I bet you'll discover way.. way more things than they ever could. Be your own astronaut, you know?
Take care out there! And tell Gabbro I said hi!
